location_positive.text: Heel gezellige en flexibele werkplek. Een losse halve of hele dag kan er gewoon zonder abonnement. Prachtig ingericht, lekkere versnaperingen zoals koekjes en fruit inbegrepen, handige locatie op een steenworp van het station. Lekkere lunchopties in het cafÃ©.

Very convenient and great co-working space!

Working at Working From _ The Hoxton has been a pleasure: they have everything you need and more! From desk with the right lighting to comfortable couches on each floor, from a very good canteen with the best soups (and democratic prices) to nice teas and coffees in the office, from super clean facilities to beautiful meeting rooms. Couldn't recommend it more!

The team is very helpful and solutions-oriented, and they go the extra mile to organise other activities (breakfasts, talks etc) as well.

Working From Brussels is a great coworking space that offers a perfect setting to work freely and productively.
The atmosphere is professional and friendly (special thanks to Gennesis, Gill and Jonathan (the "pannini" master ðŸ˜„), the team is welcoming, and the equipment is top-notch. Not to mention the setting, which is quite simply exceptionalI !
I highly recommend this place to all freelancers and businesses looking for a flexible and stimulating workspace.
Highlights:
* Inspiring and friendly environment
* Welcoming and helpful team
* State-of-the-art equipment
* Ideal location
* Perfectly suited for freelance work and small businesses
Overall, Working From is a must-visit coworking space for anyone looking for a high-quality professional environment.
Rating: 5/5

I enjoyed my time there !

Extract from their website :

Get your best work done with us

We strive to make things as comfy and convenient for you as possible by covering all bases and offering all the things you might need.
The techy stuff

Top speed WiFi
Individual secure VLAN
Printers on each floor
On-site tech manager
Reception team on hand for any requests
Wireless phone charging on desks
While youâ€™re working

Phone booths for taking calls
Meeting rooms (except for Day Pass)
Open libraries and comfy lounge areas on each floor
Help yourself pantries with snacks, teas and coffee, plus cupboards and fridges stocked with milk, mugs and glasses
Spaces and services

1st floor cafÃ© serving barista coffees with comfy seats and daybeds
Outdoor terrace
Desk-side delivery available from the hotel restaurants
Secure covered bike parking
Wellbeing

Wellness studio offering a peaceful area to enjoy programmed classes
Showers stocked with Blank toiletries

Inspiring beautiful interior, diverse interesting people present and even dogs are welcome. ðŸ˜Š
The people from the Coworking space are super friendly and explain everything you need to know on your first day.
You can also eat and drink there at democratic nice prices.
It is very easy to access by public transport, bike or car.
I highly recommend this place to work from!

community_positive.text:
Very nice place to work. You have plenty of space for informal meetings, rooms for formal meetings and booths for calls. And of course normal desks too!

If you stay at the hotel I recommend you to take a package for the coworking too.

Very convenient and great co-working space!

Working at Working From _ The Hoxton has been a pleasure: they have everything you need and more! From desk with the right lighting to comfortable couches on each floor, from a very good canteen with the best soups (and democratic prices) to nice teas and coffees in the office, from super clean facilities to beautiful meeting rooms. Couldn't recommend it more!

The team is very helpful and solutions-oriented, and they go the extra mile to organise other activities (breakfasts, talks etc) as well.

Working From Brussels is a great coworking space that offers a perfect setting to work freely and productively.
The atmosphere is professional and friendly (special thanks to Gennesis, Gill and Jonathan (the "pannini" master ðŸ˜„), the team is welcoming, and the equipment is top-notch. Not to mention the setting, which is quite simply exceptionalI !
I highly recommend this place to all freelancers and businesses looking for a flexible and stimulating workspace.
Highlights:
* Inspiring and friendly environment
* Welcoming and helpful team
* State-of-the-art equipment
* Ideal location
* Perfectly suited for freelance work and small businesses
Overall, Working From is a must-visit coworking space for anyone looking for a high-quality professional environment.
Rating: 5/5

Love the vibe of Working From environment! Inspiring atmosphere with magnificent design and great place to connect with other entrepreneurs. Peaceful working spaces and a great coffeeshop space to have a talk with my guests while grabbing a coffee.
My favourite co-working space in the world. Stunning design, super friendly team and a huge diversity of spaces for concentrated working, meetings, chilling out or eating.

room_quality_negative.text: This place used to be nice but itâ€™s just not luxury anymore , when I would come the tables would be greasy and dirty , never any snacks left , dirty toilets when I would visit in the morning , the daybeds have fluid stains on them , itâ€™s a very weird experience because it seems nice at first , but once you start to really settle in itâ€™s not maintained well. I ended up cancelling my membership and they keep your deposit without one month notice but itâ€™s not like the deposits are being used to make repairs or improvements . Not to mention the same space that we pay a membership for they rent out for private events multiple times a week and let us know the main canteen area will be off limits to members.

Edit: The management is terrible and I've had so many bad experiences with this place that I'm forced to edit my 5 star review. I was charged twice 40 days after canceling my membership. I had to file disputes to get them. They didn't even reply to my email.

State of the art library and coworking space!I've taken The Side Hustlers plan which is prefect for after-office studies.
The shower, pantry, rooms are all kept clean and filled up frequently.
You have access to printing, stationary, snacks, beverages, conference rooms, the hotel's wellness centre, etc. You can bring in guests for meetings too. Highly recommended to try if you want a library or Coworking space that's open 24x7!

I have been here a few times and loved it, but the cleaner, Elisa, was incredibly rude tonight. She was annoyed at me for eating granola at 6 p.m. and proceeded to mutter something in her own language.

When I sat down at the desks, I coughed into my elbow, to which she then proceeded to shout at me from across the kitchen to 'wear a mask.' I was not coughing repeatedly; it was one cough that was covered. For Â£54, you'd expect to eat the granola provided and cough without being accosted. This will be the last time I visit.

I ended up cancelling my membership and they keep your deposit without one month notice but itâ€™s not like the deposits are being used to make repairs or improvements . Not to mention the same space that we pay a membership for they rent out for private events multiple times a week and let us know the main canteen area will be off limits to members.

I have been here a few times and loved it, but the cleaner, Elisa, was incredibly rude tonight. She was annoyed at me for eating granola at 6 p.m. and proceeded to mutter something in her own language.

When I sat down at the desks, I coughed into my elbow, to which she then proceeded to shout at me from across the kitchen to 'wear a mask.' I was not coughing repeatedly; it was one cough that was covered. For Â£54, you'd expect to eat the granola provided and cough without being accosted. This will be the last time I visit.

location_negative.text:
Edit: The management is terrible and I've had so many bad experiences with this place that I'm forced to edit my 5 star review. I was charged twice 40 days after canceling my membership. I had to file disputes to get them. They didn't even reply to my email.

State of the art library and coworking space!I've taken The Side Hustlers plan which is prefect for after-office studies.
The shower, pantry, rooms are all kept clean and filled up frequently.
You have access to printing, stationary, snacks, beverages, conference rooms, the hotel's wellness centre, etc. You can bring in guests for meetings too. Highly recommended to try if you want a library or Coworking space that's open 24x7!
